title: (13) of section 43 of the Act of 2007, of section 92 of the Act of 2007 come
heading: 1. This order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as 

the Water Services Act 2007 

(Commencement) Order 2024. 

In this Order “Act of 2007” means the Water Services Act 2007 (No. 30
text_norm: 1 order may cited water service act 2007 (commencement) order 2024 order act 2007 mean water service act 2007 (no 30

title: (13) of section 43 of the Act of 2007, of section 92 of the Act of 2007 come
heading: of 2007).

title: (13) of section 43 of the Act of 2007, of section 92 of the Act of 2007 come
heading: 3. The 29th day of March 2024 is fixed as the day on which subsections
text_raw:
3. The 29th day of March 2024 is fixed as the day on which subsections 
(8) to (13) and (15) to (17), in so far as they refer to a notice under subsection 
(13) of section 43 of the Act of 2007, of section 92 of the Act of 2007 come 
into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 March, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [116] 3
